abstract:
-  Why environmental reproducibility is important
-  Overview of best practices for environmental reproducibility (~3-4
   min per topic)

   -  Dependency Management
   -  pip freeze > requirements.txt
   -  Pipfile.lock
   -  Containerization
   -  Automated Provisioning
   -  Environment management
   -  Pulpproject
description:
Trustworthy results require reproducibility. Publishing code is
necessary but not sufficient for complete reproducibility. Complex
programs often depend on external code. This talk will introduce you to
several ways to manage your software dependencies and data to pass
reproducible software environments to peer-reviewers.
title: Reproducible Environments for Reproducible Results
